#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int DMY(int A)
{
    int B = 0;
    
    if(A<10)
    {
        return A;
    }
    
    else
    {
        while(A>0)
        {
            B = B + A%10;
            A = A/10;
        }
        
        DMY(B);
    }
}

int main()
{
    int D, M, Y;
    char S[10];
    cin>>D>>S>>Y;
    
    if(S[0]=='J' && S[6]=='y')
		M=1;
	if(S[0]=='F')
		M=2;
	if(S[0]=='M' && S[4]=='h')
		M=3;
	if(S[0]=='A' && S[4]=='l')
		M=4;
	if(S[0]=='M' && S[2]=='y')
		M=5;
	if(S[0]=='J' && S[3]=='e')
		M=6;
	if(S[0]=='J' && S[3]=='y')
		M=7;
	if(S[0]=='A' && S[5]=='t')
		M=8;
	if(S[0]=='S' && S[8]=='r')
		M=9;
	if(S[0]=='O' && S[6]=='r')
		M=10;
	if(S[0]=='N' && S[7]=='r')
		M=11;
	if(S[0]=='D' && S[7]=='r')
		M=12;
		
	cout<<DMY(D*M + Y);
	return 0;
}
